channel.title: Hardcoding
channel.description:
Anybody know of a good place to find the colours of the items. If anybody knows the colours im looking for its bronze the gold trim on the (g) armors mithril steel iron
and also if anybody has the hardcoded format of a (g) plate, legs, and full helm that would be much appreciated.
